title: Lobo - Introducing Lobo (1971); Of A Simple Man (1972) [2005]
description:
This is the same torrent that was uploaded to Demonoid in May 2008.


Lobo - Introducing Lobo (1971)/Of A Simple Man (1972) [2005]

Includes:
Files by track, ripped at FLAC 8 using Easy CD-DA Extractor (www.poikosoft.com)
Tracks have full tags (including embedded thumbnail).
All artwork in jpgs at 300 d.p.i. Rotated and cropped losslessly.
Notes.txt (which is simply these notes included in the torrent)

Bio Excerpt from All Music:

Best remembered for soft-rock perennials like "Me and You and a Dog Named Boo" and "I'd Love You to Want Me," Lobo was the alias of singer/songwriter Roland Kent LaVoie, born July 31, 1943 in Tallahassee, FL. At 17 he joined the Rumors, whose ranks also included future luminaries like country-rock pioneer Gram Parsons, country-pop cut-up Jim Stafford, and noted drummer Jon Corneal. ....
